p.k: Art Taiwan (1992). Hrají: Lee Kang Sheng, Miao Tien, Chen Chao Jung. Režie: Tsai Ming Liang.
p.d: Defying by his parents, Hsiao Kang drops out of the local crammer to head for the bright lights of downtown Taipei. He falls in with Ah Tze, a pretty hood and their relationships is a confused mixture of hero-worship and rivalry that soon leads to trouble.
